title: Amorim refusing to quit amid Man Utd struggles ahead of Chelsea trip
description: Ruben Amorim insists quitting is not an option with Manchester United but apportioned the responsibility for their struggles to himself ahead of Friday’s Premier League trip to Chelsea. United could be forgiven for having one eye on next Wednesday’s Europa League final against Tottenham, with the winner securing Champions League football next season. title: Mallorca win showed what Madrid have been missing, says Ancelotti
description: Carlo Ancelotti believes Real Madrid would have a realistic chance of winning LaLiga if they had produced more performances akin to Wednesday’s display against Mallorca. Madrid fell behind to a neat Martin Valjent finish after just 11 minutes at the Estadio Santiago Bernabeu, knowing that anything but a victory would see Barcelona crowned champions without […] The post Mallorca win showed what Madrid have been missing, says Ancelotti appeared first on Soccer News.
